scripts.move-to-docs: rmdir /S /Q docs && mkdir docs && xcopy gdlhub-app\dist docs /E /I /Y
scripts.gitUpdate: git status && git add . && git commit -m "Project updated to Github Pages" && git push origin main
scripts.gitPages: npm run build-front && npm run move-to-docs && npm run gitUpdate
scripts.db:access: docker exec -it gdlhub-postgres psql -U gdlhub -d postgres
scripts.db:backup: docker exec gdlhub-postgres pg_dump -U gdlhub -d gdlhub_db > ./backups/backup_gdlhub.sql
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i gdlhub-postgres psql -U gdlhub -d gdlhub_db < ./backups/backup_gdlhub.sql
scripts.db:restore:all: docker exec -i gdlhub-postgres psql -U gdlhub -d postgres < ./backups/full_backup_all.sql
scripts.help:
node -e "console.log("
